snippet.title: Hellbreach: Vegas - Alpha Demo Trailer - PAX East
snippet.description:
Play the Alpha Demo of Hellbreach: Vegas on Steam or at PAX East from March 23rd to March 26th.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1691320/Hellbreach_Vegas/

Hellbreach: Vegas is a fast-paced, action-packed game that pits you against endless hordes of demons as you fight to save humanity with your friends or solo. With its intense combat and stunning visuals, it is tailor-made for fans of the online co-op PvE genre.

Hellbreach: Vegas - Alpha Demo content:
- 1 map: Midnight Monsoon
- 1 game mode: Solo Survival
- 1 difficulty level: Beginner
- 17 weapons
- 4 characters with each having 1 additional unlockable outfit


Stay up to date with Hellbreach: Vegas and Iceberg Interactive: 

Hellbreach: Vegas:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playhellbreach
Discord: https://discord.gg/z4X5aC8k7v
Steam page: https://bit.ly/HellbreachVegasOnSteam

Iceberg Interactive:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int
Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive
Official website: [Game/Iceberg website]
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam

#hellbreach #hellbreachvegas #fps  #fpsgames #CoopShooter #pcgaming #steam #pax #paxeast
